# replaceBusses(_:)

**Instance Method**

Replaces the current bus array with a copy of the supplied bus array.

## Declaration

```swift
func replaceBusses(_ busArray: [AUAudioUnitBus])
```

## Parameters

- **busArray**: The new bus array.

## Discussion

The base class issues KVO notifications.
title: replaceBusses(_:)
